svg:

"Scope" refers to the set of code that can access a variable.StackHeap (Managed Heap){var fido = new Dog();fido.Name = "Fido";}public class Dog { public string Name; } var myLifeStory = "I was born in Akron Ohio at St. Thomas Hospital";myLifeStory = myLifeStory + " And then I grew up and learned to code";str mls 43I was born in Akron....42I was born in Akron.... And then I grew up"43
